price: "Kuma idan kuka jũya bãya, to, ban tambaye ku wata ijãra ba. ljãrata ba ta zama ba fãce daga Allah, kuma an umurce ni da in kasance daga mãsu sallamãwa."*
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَمَا سَأَلۡتُكُم مِّنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: * Watau dukan abin da na zo muku da shi na umurni kõ hani, to, ni ma an umurce ni da yinsa kõ barinsa. Kuma bã ni neman wata ijãrar karantarwa daga gare ku dõmin Allah Ya umarce ni da iyar da manzancinsa zuwa gare ku, sabõda haka Shi ne zai biyã ni tsãdar aikĩna.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaytum famā sa-altukum min ajrin in ajriya illā ʿalā al-lahi wa-umir'tu an akūna mina al-mus'limīna
